function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rubbish bags as potential vectors of disease transmission","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases in areas with high risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Special care and handling of waste in areas with high risk of contagion","Technologies":"Incineration and strict disinfection of collection vehicles","People":"Resident in quarantined houses or areas with outbreaks of contagion","Owner":"Local waste management or public health authorities"},{"Description":"Incineration emitting polluting gases","Impact":"Environmental pollution from incineration of waste","Mitigation":"Integration of waste management solutions with lower resource consumption and improved recyclability","Technologies":"Improved waste incineration technology with lower emissions","People":"General public, environmental agencies","Owner":"Government, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Reduced activity leading to less waste in landfills but also reducing recycling","Impact":"Changes in waste management activity affecting landfill usage and recycling rates","Mitigation":"Integration of waste management solutions with improved recyclability and lower resource consumption","Technologies":"Waste management technology for improved sorting and recycling","People":"Waste management companies, recycling facilities","Owner":"Environmental agencies"}]}
